connector.description: Send data to Google Vertex AI for generating content with generative AI models.

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.model.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.modelId
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.model.description: The Model ID to use for predictions (e.g., gemini-2.5-pro).

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.servi.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.servi.description: The service account key to use as credentials for the Vertex AI client. You must encode this value in base64.

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.tempe.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.temperature
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.tempe.description: Controls randomness in generation. Lower values make output more deterministic. Range 0.0 to 1.0.

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.maxOu.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.maxOutputTokens
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.maxOu.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response.

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topP.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topP
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topP.description: Nucleus sampling parameter. Considers tokens with top_p probability mass. Range 0.0 to 1.0.

camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topK.name: camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topK
camel.kamelet.google-vertexai-sink.topK.description: Only sample from the top K options for each subsequent token.
